expert.name: Isabella Grace Harrington
expert.title: Founder & CEO of TechNova
expert.tagline: Built TechNova from idea to $100M valuation. Helping founders scale their startups.

about.bio:
Isabella is the Founder and CEO of TechNova, a B2B SaaS platform that she built from idea to $100M valuation in 4 years. She's raised over $50M in funding from top-tier VCs including Sequoia and a16z.

With 12+ years in the startup ecosystem, Isabella has deep expertise in product-market fit, scaling teams, fundraising, and building sustainable growth engines. She's passionate about helping early-stage founders avoid common pitfalls and accelerate their path to success.

Before TechNova, Isabella was VP of Product at DataSync (acquired by Salesforce) and started her career as a software engineer at Google.

experience.description: Built B2B SaaS platform from $0 to $100M valuation. Raised $50M+ across 3 funding rounds.
Led product team of 25+ through acquisition. Grew ARR from $10M to $40M.
Built core infrastructure for Google Cloud. Led projects serving 1B+ users.

topics.title: Product-Market Fit Deep Dive
topics.description: Get clarity on whether you've achieved PMF and what to focus on next

topics.title: Fundraising Strategy Session
topics.description: Review your pitch deck, financial model, and fundraising approach

topics.title: Scaling Strategy Review
topics.description: Plan your path from current stage to next level of growth

topics.title: Team Building & Hiring
topics.description: Build the right team structure and hiring processes for growth

reviews.review: Isabella's insights were game-changing. She helped me identify exactly why our growth was plateauing and gave me a clear roadmap to achieve true PMF. The frameworks she shared are gold.
Incredible session. Isabella reviewed our pitch deck and gave specific, actionable feedback that transformed our story. We closed our Series A 2 months later using her suggestions.
Isabella understands the challenges of going from 0 to 1 to 100. Her advice on team structure and processes helped us scale from 10 to 50 people without losing our culture.
As a first-time founder, Isabella's guidance was invaluable. She helped me prioritize features and build a sustainable product development process. Highly recommend!
